name: Chain Channel Vandalism
description:
Break channels of the same color before TV overtakes you!

Warning: Game Has a Little Flashing and a Lot of Colors

Throw a punch, land a kick,

don't let Remote control you.

Reduce TV to static,

and finish with a bomb or two.

Match the like colors of the TV channels to destroy them, and activate power-ups every so-often to help you along the way! Destroy all the channels of one color, randomize and create new matches, get rid of the tallest stack of TVs, and take a breather for 5 seconds. Be careful; the TVs pop up faster and faster as time goes on. How high of a score can you get?

Everything is made by me, PepperGhost. If I find any more hiccups in the game, I'll try to fix them ASAP!
